_description: A prophetic curse on Urse d’Abetot, Norman sheriff of Worcester, ascribed to Aldred/Ealdred, last Saxon Bishop of York, by William of Malmesbury

OxfMagd172.Note: William of Malmesbury, Gesta Pontificum, Cap. 115.
